attributes.action: Keep indoor softplay centres open in wales.
attributes.additional_details:
Indoor playcentres provide a vital service to their local communities. 
Many hold baby & toddler groups which is important for the mental health of mew mums & stimulation of babies and young children. 
Social services use play Centres for children in foster care to have parental contact each week.

For many parents, a play centre where they can visit and relax while their children play Safely is an important outlet for them.
attributes.background:
To provide evidence to support the decision that Indoor soft-play centres & other indoor entertainment businesses need to close in Wales. 
Prove that these types of setting are causing the virus & are the most dangerous. 
Pubs,gyms,leisure centres & non-essential retail are ALLOWED to remain open.

rejection.details:
Your petition is about something that the Welsh Government is responsible for. That means that the UK Government and Parliament can't look into it. 

The Welsh Parliament has its own Petitions Committee. If you'd like to send your petition to the Welsh Parliament, you can find out more here:
https://petitions.senedd.wales/
